description:
Ciro is former military, and spent the last 4 years in the Service.
Now that he is out, he is doing his best to make his way. His dream is to be a known DJ, and is putting all his efforts into making that happen. He plays DJ gigs in parts of Texas, and is always looking for an honest gig. His mixes are amazing!
He has a nice 7.5 - 8 inch cock, and knows that swinging it at the clubs is also a way to get attention and some cash flowing.
Ciro has had the same girlfriend for about 7 years. He identifies as Bi, and so his girlfriend sounds like she is actually as sexually fluid as he is. He has been with guys, only topping them, but sucking and being sucked seems to be where his experience level is.
title: Ciro - Solo
